resources.string:
This app shows the best quotes of Barney Stinson, choose the one you want to listen to by selecting it in the list hidden on the left panel. 

Use the buttons on the bottom control panel to PLAY and STOP the sounds, set them as Ringtones or Notifications, and SHARE them through your favourite social networks including WhatsApp. You can also use the SHUFFLE button to play a random quote. 

On the menu, press CONTACT to reach us on our e-mail address in case you want to let us know any recommendation or suggestion you can come up with. Press the RATE button to visit our app site in the Google Play Market. And lastly press SHARE to recommend this app to your friends.

This app is:
LEGEN... wait for it... DARY!!
Barney Stinson Best Quotes from RudeDroid Developers

Enjoy the best quotes of Barney Stinson from How I met your mother.

Share them through your favourite social networks including WhatsApp.

You will find it published on Google Play completely free.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eng.barneystinson
Listen to what Barney Stinson has to tell you
